Articles.Content:
With the intrepid SLS I got to the moon and back!

this is only my 3rd day of playing!

wohoo!

(yes the kerbals survived)
Nice work, maybe you can add some pics in spoiler tags to improve your OP?

Congratulations! Yeah, that\'s pretty good for just the third day. Were there any close calls? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Yes, pics please! As they say around here, 'Pics, or it didn\'t happen.' (But I\'ll believe you anyway.)

well, since i landed on a montain, my craft exploded but they survived.

also how do i take pics? lol

> 
> also how do i take pics? lol

F1. They\'ll show up in /KSP/Screenshots/

> 
> well, since i landed on a montain, my craft exploded but they survived.
> 
> also how do i take pics? lol

You landed on a mountain?! ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Double congratulations from me

> 
> You landed on a mountain?! ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)
> 
> Double congratulations from me

yeah, on kearth.

> 
> It\'s Kerbin ;D

i coulda sworn that kerbin is their home TOWN and the KEARTH is EARTH.

cuz i didnt land back in kerbin, i landed in asia or somthing.

so i landed on the KEARTH.

> 
> i coulda sworn that kerbin is their home TOWN and the KEARTH is EARTH.
> 
> cuz i didnt land back in kerbin, i landed in asia or somthing.
> 
> so i landed on the KEARTH.

Nope. Check the map view. It\'s Kerbin.

> 
> Nope. Check the map view. It\'s Kerbin.

Weird ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

people have been calling it kearth

Well, with c7 aerospace divison, mechjeb, IFE i managed to get to the moon again.

and i took pics!

ready to intercept mun: 

![2yxi5a0.png](http://i50.tinypic.com/2yxi5a0.png)

intercepted. prepare for retrograde

![2v3gg2r.png](http://i47.tinypic.com/2v3gg2r.png)

picture of my rocket doing retrograde (ps if you just ad boosters to the bottem, thats what it origanally looked like)

![sm645h.png](http://i46.tinypic.com/sm645h.png)

Ok, ready to land.

![301g6yg.png](http://i47.tinypic.com/301g6yg.png)

course corrected to land in the flat area

![2r23yuc.png](http://i46.tinypic.com/2r23yuc.png)

here comes the mun!

![10i876t.png](http://i45.tinypic.com/10i876t.png)

didnt know i had too much fuel ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png) ejecting stage.

![1ev0oh.png](http://i50.tinypic.com/1ev0oh.png)

another stage down. burning.

![1623ds4.png](http://i49.tinypic.com/1623ds4.png)

Near landing!!!!

![99pbt2.png](http://i47.tinypic.com/99pbt2.png)

YEAH! 8)

![28tddmg.png](http://i49.tinypic.com/28tddmg.png)

heres where i am.

![xwuaa.png](http://i48.tinypic.com/xwuaa.png)

got in mun orbit, prepare for burn home

![j16akg.png](http://i48.tinypic.com/j16akg.png)

escaped moons gravity

![14o1x6e.png](http://i48.tinypic.com/14o1x6e.png)

prepare for a retro burn

![27yvqls.png](http://i47.tinypic.com/27yvqls.png)

thats all for now
